title: Limits plea bargaining for felony sex offense charges
summary: Provides that when a person is charged with certain designated sexual offenses, any plea bargain shall contain a plea of guilty to at least one of such offenses, unless the district attorney determines that such a charge is not warranted, in which event, the defendant may plead to another charge in satisfaction of the charges preferred.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to limiting plea bargaining for sexual offenders
